sources.note: Main website. Describes Veracity as all-in-one cloud EMR/PM/billing with 28 years experience. Lists core modules: EHR, practice management, billing, patient engagement, e-prescribing, telemedicine, lab interface, mobile apps.
EHR product page. Details clinical features: customizable templates, machine learning for treatment preferences, EPCS, lab interface, clinical decision support, mobile app capabilities.

All-in-one overview page. Lists all modules: EHR, practice management, patient engagement, merit-based payment. Confirms data types handled include demographics, insurance, medical history, medications, schedules, lab results, imaging, chart notes.

Practice management page. Details charge capture, billing, eligibility, electronic claims, claim scrubbing, denial management, remittance, collections, credit card processing, clearinghouse, document management, e-fax, analytics dashboard.
Billing-specific page. Details claim submission, rejection tracking, denial follow-up, electronic payment posting, collection letters, patient statements with online payment.

Patient portal page. Patients can update demographics/insurance/history/medications, view records (appointments, clinical summaries, health maintenance, immunizations, medications, labs), request refills, schedule appointments, send secure messages, pay bills. Physician controls what patients see.
Specialty page listing 50+ supported specialties from allergy/immunology through urology. Suggests general-purpose ambulatory EHR with customizable specialty templates.
About page. Describes AllegianceMD as innovative, privately held company operating 20+ years. Cloud-based with 100% uptime claim. ONC Certified. Emphasizes personalized support and automation.
